com.squareup.picasso.pollexor

Class PollexorRequestTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.squareup.picasso.pollexor.PollexorRequestTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.squareup.picasso.Picasso.RequestTransformer

    public class PollexorRequestTransformer
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.squareup.picasso.Picasso.RequestTransformer
    A Picasso.RequestTransformer that changes requests to use Thumbor for some remote transformations.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.squareup.picasso.Picasso.RequestTransformer

        IDENTITY

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PollexorRequestTransformer(java.lang.String host)
      Deprecated. 
      Use PollexorRequestTransformer(Thumbor) instead. Create a transformer for the specified Thumbor host. This will not use URL encryption.
      PollexorRequestTransformer(java.lang.String host, java.lang.String key)
      Deprecated. 
      Use PollexorRequestTransformer(Thumbor) instead. Create a transformer for the specified Thumbor host using the provided URL encryption key.
      PollexorRequestTransformer(com.squareup.pollexor.Thumbor thumbor)
      Create a transformer for the specified Thumbor.
